name: Extracurriculars
description:
Run the RoundedGUI.exe for the game!

It's Valentine's Day. You're alone and failing all your classes. You just can't seem to pick a struggle, can you? But, the universe finally heard your pleas and granted you personified incarnations of the subjects you're failing at: PE, English, Math, and Science. What could possibly go wrong?

Answer: Everything

  • around 30 minutes of gameplay
  • 5 endings
  • 4 colorful love interests

Hey! My name's Alyssa. I'm the sole developer for Extracurriculars. I did the art, storyline, and programming for this game! It's my first time developing something like this, and I sincerely hope you enjoy it. 

The background music was provided by Anttis Instrumentals!

If you have any questions for me please don't hesitate to ask! You can contact me via discord at lysterine#7902

Thank you so much for checking this game out!

  1.  Who was your favorite character and why?
  2.  What was your favorite scene in the game and why?
  3.  Would you want a full length version of this game?
